content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 3, Bristol Rovers 2.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 3, Bristol Rovers 2.
Foul by Rory Gaffney (Bristol Rovers).
Branislav Ivanovic (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Victor Moses (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
